title: Verify: Implement Sandboxing for Code Node
description:
Run automated tests for task T-068.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Harden the Code Node to ensure sandboxing: subprocess with resource limits, no filesystem access beyond /tmp, input sanitization.
Criteria:
- Code Node execution is sandboxed
- Resource limits enforced
- No unauthorized filesystem or network access
acceptance_criteria: No unauthorized filesystem or network access
